record.properties: Top = 220 Left = 1 Width = 765 Height = 493 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
Top = 20 Left = 10 Height = 343 Width = 117 Alias = "mr_log" Order = "" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_log" Name = "Cursor1"
Top = 20 Left = 150 Height = 352 Width = 228 Alias = "mr_instances" Order = "iname" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_instances" Name = "Cursor2"
DoCreate = .T. Caption = "LOG" mr_iguid = .F. uniqueid = 592EF988041C45D1957EF7B8A89F58A1 Name = "MR_LOG" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE init2 *!* init2
local iguid
if not empty(thisform.p1)
thisform.mr_iguid = thisform.p1
else
thisform.mr_iguid = _inigetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', '00000000')
endif
thisform.mr_setinstance()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_setinstance *!* mr_setinstance
if thisform.mr_iguid = '00000000' and reccount('mr_instances') > 0 then
go top in 'mr_instances'
thisform.mr_iguid = mr_instances.iguid
endif
if seek(thisform.mr_iguid, 'mr_instances', 'iguid') = .t.
if empty(mr_instances.iname) then
thisform.caption = 'LOG - ' + _shortenpath(mr_instances.ifolder, 240)
else
thisform.caption = 'LOG - ' + _shortenpath(mr_instances.iname, 240)
endif
select 'mr_log'
set filter to mr_log.iguid == thisform.mr_iguid in 'mr_log'
go bottom in 'mr_log'
if reccount('mr_log') > thisform.gridmain.height / thisform.gridmain.rowheight * (-1)
skip thisform.gridmain.height / thisform.gridmain.rowheight * (-1) in 'mr_log'
endif
thisform.gridmain.refresh()
go bottom in 'mr_log'
else
thisform.setall('ENABLED', .f.)
thisform.tbinstances.enabled = .t.
thisform.caption = 'LOG - NO INSTANCE SELECTED'
endif
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Height = 456 Left = 12 Top = 36 Width = 936 _gridcontextmenulang = en Name = "gridmain"

Top = 0 Left = 924 Height = 28 Width = 28 FontSize = 8 Picture = ..\res\3bars.png Caption = "" TabIndex = 7 ToolTipText = "MENU" ZOrderSet = 21 tbalign = 2 tbautowidth = .F. tbpictureautosize = .F. tbmenuoffseth = 6 tbautofontsize = .F. tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbmenu"

Top = 0 Left = 12 Height = 28 Width = 100 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_expand_more_black_18dp.png Caption = "INSTANCES" ToolTipText = "OPEN INSTANCES MENU" PicturePosition = 4 ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbinstances"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local iguid, nselect, result
m.nselect = select()
use 'mr_instances' again in 0 order tag 'INAME' alias 'menu_instances'
select 'menu_instances'
scan
this.tbmenuitemadd(recno('menu_instances'), 0, 0, 0, 0, menu_instances.iname + ' - ' + menu_instances.ifolder)
endscan
m.result = this.tbmenushow()
if m.result > 0 then
go m.result in 'menu_instances'
thisform.mr_iguid = menu_instances.iguid
endif
use in 'menu_instances'
_restorearea(m.nselect)
if m.result > 0 then
thisform.mr_setinstance()
endif ENDPROC
